data.title: Phumtham to send a clear message on sovereignty over Ko Kut
data.description: Defence Minister Phumtham Wechayachai will visit Koh Kut island in Trat province on Saturday to reiterate Thailand’s sovereignty over the island.

data.title: Pakistan’s air pollution sends nearly 1,000 to hospital
data.description: LAHORE — More than 900 people have been admitted to hospital in a single day in the Pakistani megacity of Lahore due to air pollution, the local government said.

data.title: Australia to ban social media for children under 16
data.description: Children in Australia under the age of 16 will be banned from  social media  as part of a push to protect young people’s mental health, Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has announced, with the companies involved required to enforce the new regulations or face potential fines.

data.title: Philippines evacuates thousands ahead of Typhoon Yinxing
data.description: The Philippines has evacuated thousands of people from coastal communities ahead of a major typhoon, officials said Thursday, just weeks after a tropical cyclone left at least 150 people dead.

data.title: Pattaya set to dazzle with International Fireworks Festival 2024
data.description: Pattaya City is gearing up to host a spectacular fireworks display at the Pattaya International Fireworks Festival 2024.

data.title: Lawyer caught trying to flee 71 million baht embezzlement charges
data.description: Police detained Sittha and his wife before they could get to the Cambodian border, they now face charges of fraud, money laundering and embezzlement

data.title: Thailand has the potential to be world’s sustainable protein hub: study
data.description: The transition to plant-based protein production could generate more than 1 million jobs in Thailand and deliver economic benefits worth 1.3 trillion baht by 2050, according to a new report released as global leaders gather for the COP29 climate summit in Baku, the capital of Azerbaijan.

data.title: Most firms track sustainability manually, stalling progress: survey
data.description: A new global survey has revealed that while 80% of businesses have established sustainability targets, more than half are still relying on manual methods to track their progress, potentially hampering their environmental efforts.

data.title: Lawyer, wife arrested for alleged fraud, money-laundering
data.description: Police arrested high-profile lawyer Sittra Biabungkerd and his wife on a highway in Chachoengsao

data.title: BMA brings Lanna-style Loy Krathong celebrations to Bangkok
data.description: Charoen Krung Road decorated with Lanna-style lanterns and vertical flags ahead of the official opening on Nov 13

data.title: Palm oil prices will drop from January, say Surat Thani farmers
data.description: Cooking oil prices have risen temporarily due to reduced supply, but the Commerce Ministry says it is working to keep prices stable and is encouraging consumers to opt for alternatives

data.title: Bangkok to crack down on irresponsible pet owners with new ordinance
data.description: New regulations will limit the number of cats and dogs residents can keep and will mandate microchipping to prevent dumping of pets

data.title: Unlocking AI's Potential: A Guide for Thai Organizations in the Digital Age
data.description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly reshaping industries worldwide, and Thailand is no exception. As organisations across the country seek to remain competitive, understanding and effectively implementing AI has become paramount.

data.title: International Competition: Revealing the new world cinema
data.description: The “International Competition” category of the 16th World Film Festival of Bangkok, which kicks off today, spotlights filmmakers at the beginning of their careers.

data.title: BDMS Wellness Clinic Introduces 1 Million Baht Longevity Card for Optimal Health
data.description: BDMS Wellness Clinic, a leading preventive healthcare center, introduces the Longevity Card  —an exquisite privilege designed to help individuals transcend traditional health care limits through the Wellness Life Blueprint, a sustainable roadmap to  optimal  health. This  privilege  card offers comprehensive health assessments, providing insights into micronutrient balance, sleep quality, weight management, mental health support, personalized exercise planning, and lifestyle medicine for enhanced  healthspan . Supported by BDMS Wellness Clinic ’ s dedicated team of preventive medicine specialists, the Longevity Card ensures personalized care for every client. Valued at over 1.5 million THB, the card includes meticulously curated benefits to  enrich  your wellness journey. This launch marks a significant step in positioning Thailand as a Wellness Destination of the World .

data.title: UOB and GoWabi co-host a seminar to support Beauty & Wellness businesses
data.description: UOB Thailand, in collaboration with GoWabi, the online platform for beauty and wellness deals, has organised the "Passion to Success" seminar for beauty and wellness SMEs. Held at the UOB Plaza headquarters, this event aimed to facilitate knowledge sharing and present financial solutions for businesses seeking to enhance their competitive edge.

data.title: Bodies of four Thai workers killed in Israel to arrive on Friday
data.description: The bodies of four Thai workers killed by rocket fire in northern Israel on Oct 31 will arrive at Suvarnabhumi airport in Samut Prakan province on Friday afternoon.

data.title: EGAT to invest 90 billion baht on 3 pumped-storage hydropower plants
data.description: These plants will use renewable energy to pump water to upper reservoirs during low-demand periods, then release it to generate electricity during peak periods

data.title: Transport minister plans road safety campaign for motorcyclists
data.description: Transport Minister Suriya Jungrungreangkit has announced a plan aimed at promoting road safety, particularly targeting motorcyclists and their passengers who fail to wear crash helmets.

data.title: New movies out this week: Nov 7-13
data.description: New releases that hit cinemas in Thailand this week.

data.title: Germany's coalition collapses, leaving the government teetering
data.description: BERLIN — German Chancellor Olaf Scholz fired his finance minister Wednesday, effectively ending his three-party ruling coalition and destabilising his centre-left government just as the election of Donald Trump in the United States presented Europe with new economic and security challenges.

data.title: In search of your Mello
data.description: In a post-Covid world, technology is changing the future of spa treatments. New spa trends include biohacking, spiritual wellbeing, sleep optimisation and eco-design.

data.title: Past love celebrated at new art space in Samut Prakan
data.description: Located inside Baan Yindee restaurant, the first exhibition focuses on the graphic design discipline known as text art

data.title: Over 1,500 Runners Join Vietjet's Eco-Friendly Charity Run
data.description: Over 1,500 runners participated in the
